data.title: How to Hit a Triple Bodyweight Deadlift
data.author: Jessica
data.content: Build Strength, Don't Test It. One of the most common mistakes novice lifters make is testing their 1RM (one-rep max) and working at near-max percentages too often. Your tissues and nervous system can't constantly handle high intensities. Training too often above 90% of your 1RM will leave you feeling tired, sore, and beat up.
